Topic.Title: ### no longer seems to make headings

Posts.EditableText: I'd been using the desktop version of Squiffy for Windows, and had been marking some of the text with # symbols at the beginning of the line to change the text size. Now I've installed Squiffy 5, and the same file I'd been working on before now displays the # symbols in the story output rather than changing the text size. Possibly I messed something else up but if so, I don't know what. How can I make headings display properly?
Posts.HTML: I'd been using the desktop version of Squiffy for Windows, and had been marking some of the text with # symbols at the beginning of the line to change the text size. Now I've installed Squiffy 5, and the same file I'd been working on before now displays the # symbols in the story output rather than changing the text size. Possibly I messed something else up but if so, I don't know what. How can I make headings display properly?

Posts.EditableText: Ok...the headings seems to work properly if I leave a space between the # and the text. That was not required in the earlier version so it threw me a bit. Problem solved.
Posts.HTML: Ok...the headings seems to work properly if I leave a space between the # and the text. That was not required in the earlier version so it threw me a bit. Problem solved.
